questions.questionTitle: What do you think of the European Union integration process

answers.answerText: The EU should evolve to a European Federation
The EU should continue the integration process
The EU should remain as is
The national states need to be sovereign again

questions.questionTitle: Do you accept rotating presidency within the framework of a solution to the Cyprus problem?

answers.answerText: Yes, rotating presidency can be accepted within an overall acceptable solution
No, rotating presidency can't be accepted
Only if it's included with a single ballot and a single voting base
I don't know

questions.questionTitle: What should be Cyprus's approach to the Israeli-Palestinian conflict?

answers.answerText: Cyprus should call for immediate ceasefire in Gaza and the end of the occupation
Cyprus should defend Israel's right to defend itself and the continuation of the operation in Gaza
Cyprus should stay neutral
Πρεπει να υποστηρίξει την
I don't know / Prefer not to say

questions.questionTitle: Within the EU, what should be Cyprus's position regarding the invasion in Ukraine?

answers.answerText: Cyprus should continue supporting imposing of sanctions against Russia until Ukraine is free
Cyprus should support the end of the conflict and for peace negotiations between Ukraine and Russia to begin
Cyprus should block future sanctions to Russia
I don't know / Prefer not to say

questions.questionTitle: Where should the Republic of Cyprus focus its efforts in relation to Turkey?

answers.answerText: On imposing sanctions to Turkey
On implementing Trust Building measures(including possibly opening new crossing points)
On both the above
On imposing sanctions to Turkey and to Turkish Cypriots (including possibly closing the crossing points)
I don't know / Prefer not to say

questions.questionTitle: What strategy should be followed to get closer to achieving a solution to the Cyprus problem?

answers.answerText: We should focus on the resumption of negotiations from the point they left off in Crans Montana, accepting the Guterres Framework as is
We should focus on the resumption of negotiations without accepting some of the previous unacceptable convergences
The Cyprus problem should be refocused as an issue of invasion and occupation, refraining from engaging in bi-communal dialogue
I don't know / Prefer not to say

questions.questionTitle: What is your stance regarding abortions

answers.answerText: The right of women to choose what to do with their bodies needs to be protected.
Abortions should only be acceptable in cases of rape, fetal abnormalities, or when the life of the mother is threatened.
They need to be banned. The life of the embryo must be protected
I don't know / Prefer not to say

questions.questionTitle: Should same-sex marriages and the adoption of children by same-sex couples be legalized?

answers.answerText: Yes, both should be legalised, same-sex couples should have the same rights as heterosexual couples
Yes for same-sex marriage, but not for adoption
No, for neither same-sex marriage nor for adoption
I don't know / Prefer not to say

No

questions.questionTitle: Should the Republic of Cyprus join the 'Patternship for Peace' and NATO?

The RoC should neither join PfP nor NATO

questions.questionTitle: What's your opinion regarding the underwater natural gas pipeline East Med

answers.answerText: The ongoing efforts to create East Med should be sustained, as they are crucial for positioning Cyprus as a key energy hub in the Mediterranean.
While the creation of East Med would be beneficial for Cyprus, it is not a realistic option
Extraction of fossil fuels belongs to the past. We need to focus on Renewable Energy Sources
I don't know / Prefer not to say
